value: $WmMPID_開花イシュタル,ch06_11_Ishtar_F_Bloom01,Face|Lord Julius... I do love you.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Your Highness...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|...Wh-who's there?$k$p$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Please, take this. I hope you can
forgive the humble quality of this
food and drink...$k$pEven those condemned to death
deserve a last meal.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|...No. I can't take it. Letizia told
me about the orders she gave.$k$pIf she finds out you did this, she will
have you punished. I won't let that
happen for my sake...$k$p$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Your Highness...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|The empire is divided. The people
do not know who, between you and
Letizia, is on the side of truth...$k$pThe citizenry...even we soldiers...
We don't know what to do.$k$pPlease, Your Highness... You didn't
really commit all those horrible acts,
did you? I need to know.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|No. I would not act against my
own people.$k$p$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Then it is as we feared.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|W-wait. Do not be satisfied with
my answer alone. Go to Letizia.
Ask for her truth as well.$k$p$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|You want me to...ask Director Letizia?
I don't understand.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Stain,Face|I may be lying as far as you know,
trying to play you for a fool.$k$pDo not be swayed to take sides
so easily.$k$pRemember that, after my execution.$k$pTake no one at their word. Learn all
you can before deciding for yourself.$k$pEmbla's future will not be determined
by royals like me, or like Letizia.$k$pIt will be the people of Embla who
decide its fate.$k$p$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Sbs150|
